long_description: The REI Dual Converter kit reduces 220 volts to 110 volts so you can use your appliances in countries operating on 220 volts. Low setting for electronics up to 50 watts; high setting for heating appliances up to 2000 watts. 2-pin plug fits most European outlets. Features an auto reset fuse. Set comes in a convenient travel pouch and includes 4 international adapter plugs, including 1 for most of Europe. Includes ungrounded adapters covering plug-in types : A,B,C,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L. Not intended for use with computers. Designed for use with dual voltage appliances; not for continuous use. Important: Check your appliance wattage before operation to determine appropriate switch setting. Do not use with appliances equipped with timers or automatic functions. Please note: Adapter plugs allow travel appliances to fit into foreign outlets; they do not convert electricity.
short_description: The REI Dual Converter kit reduces 220 volts to 110 volts so you can use your appliances in countries operating on 220 volts.
